name: MLCGraphCompilationOptions
desc: A bitmask that specifies the options you use when compiling a graph.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt64)
items.desc: Creates a graph compilation option with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var debugLayers: MLCGraphCompilationOptions
items.desc: The option to debug layers during graph compilation.

items.name: static var disableLayerFusion: MLCGraphCompilationOptions
items.desc: The option to disable layer fusion during graph compilation.

items.name: static var linkGraphs: MLCGraphCompilationOptions
items.desc: The option to link graphs during graph compilation.

items.name: static var computeAllGradients: MLCGraphCompilationOptions
items.desc: The option to compute all gradients during graph compilation.
